title: BarBox
summary: BarBox is the next generation Jukebox.
description: 1. Choose a BarBox place on the the BarBox map and go there 2. Connect to the establishment's Wi-Fi 3. Choose playlist and pick out your favorite music from millions up-to-date songs. If you want BarBox at your favorite place, just tell the owner to visit www.barboxapp.com and get it. If you want to use the BarBox app as an Admin (bar, music club, restaurant, fitness club etc.) just register at www.barboxapp.com.We are BarBox, not bar box :)
descriptionHTML:
1. Choose a BarBox place on the the BarBox map and go there

2. Connect to the establishment's Wi-Fi

3. Choose playlist and pick out your favorite music from millions up-to-date songs.

If you want BarBox at your favorite place, just tell the owner to
visit www.barboxapp.com and get it.

If you want to use the BarBox app as an Admin (bar, music club, restaurant, fitness club etc.) just register at www.barboxapp.com.

We are BarBox, not bar box :)
comments: Just been to a gig done by Inspired Events DJ and they told us we could download this app and send them music requests So they could play our music & not have to even go over to them. It's fantastic! Never seen anyone else use anything like this before at all! Its fantastic, Especially when You cant remember who sang the song or what the Song is called! This app is fab& it makes me want to go to more parties that have this!
